description.oldValue: ,Microsoft Purview Information protection now allows to configure labels to be scoped for files only or emails only. Outlook on the web will show those email-scoped labels in emails and will not show non-email-scoped labels.
description.newValue: ,[This is a duplicate of 99939 and will be removed.] Microsoft Purview Information protection now allows to configure labels to be scoped for files only or emails only. Outlook on the web will show those email-scoped labels in emails and will not show non-email-scoped labels.
